title: new-deadline-submission
description: A command to deliver metadata about a new document submission added to a deadline

name.description: The name of the FO user who made the submission

email.description: The email address of the FO user who made the submission

interestedParty.description: Was the submission made by an interested party on behalf of someone else?

deadline.description: The name of the deadline which the submission was made against

submissionType.description: The name of the deadline line item the submission was made against

sensitiveData.description: Does the submission contain sensitive data?

submissionId.description: ID of the submission in the database

blobKey.description: The identifier of the document in blob storage
